'''''Amon Hen'' 209''' is the two-hundred-and-ninth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in [[January]] [[2008]].

The article "Some Family Connections with J.R.R. Tolkien" by B.S. Benedikz contains many [[Index:Reminiscences of J.R.R. Tolkien|reminiscences]], and also includes two [[Index:Writings by J.R.R. Tolkien|quotes attributed]] to [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]].
